## Effort model {#sec-gentle-labyrinth-effort}

$$
E = \frac{c}{n} + r
$$ {#eq-gentle-labyrinth-effort}

Here, $E$ represents the estimated effort, $c$ is baseline complexity, $n$ is team size, and $r$ is a fixed review overhead.
